report.title: Cured My Insomnia
report.author: Insomniac
report.bodytext: I started taking this drug for major insomnia. My doctor prescribed it to me and I was a little apprehensive at first because of it's history of being a drug with strange side effects. I've taken all of the drugs for insomnia including, Ambien 5mg and 10mg, Xanax up to 2mg @ bedtime, all of the OTC's, and this drug by far is the most effective. Additionally it's one of the cheapest prescription sleep aids I've tried and I love it. I highly recommend this drug to anyone with insomnia.
